question:
Which of the following correctly define the provisions provided in the constitution (One Hundred and Twenty- Fourth Amendment) Bill?
  1. It will extend 10% quota to the economically weaker sections in the general category
  2. The 10% reservation will be in addition to the existing cap of 50% reservation for the Scheduled Castes, Scheduled Tribes and the Other Backward Classes.
  3. The passing of the bill will need an amendment to the article 14 and article 17 of the Indian constitution
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The bill is to amend the Constitution to extend 10% reservation in direct recruitment in government jobs and for admission in higher educational institutions. It will need an amendment of Articles 15 (prohibition of discrimination on grounds of religion, race, caste, sex or place of birth) and 16 (equality of opportunity in matters of public employment) of the Constitution.
